meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>collect</kanji> to the <kanji>middle</kanji> of yourself, you are collecting towards your brain. All energy is going towards there, massing up in the middle, giving you extreme <vocabulary>concentration</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>focus</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
